name: CBO
description: All issues dealing with Hive's cost based optimizer and its interaction with Optiq

name: Clients
description: Tracks issues dealing with CLI, Webclient, JDBC clients or other such clients.

name: Database/Schema
description: Issues related to support for multiple Datasbases/Schemas

name: HBase Metastore
description: Metastore using hbase to store metadata

name: HCatalog
description: Tracks issues related to the HCatalog

name: Locking
description: Issues related to the Locking system

name: Logging
description: Tracks issues dealing with logging and log messages.

name: Logical Optimizer
description: Optimizations which are independent of runtime.

name: Physical Optimizer
description: Optimizations which are dependent on runtime

name: Query Processor
description: Tracks issues dealing with query processing.

name: Server Infrastructure
description: Tracks issues dealing with Server infrastructure

name: SQL
description: Issues related to Hive Query Language and its conformance with ANSI SQL.

name: Testing Infrastructure
description: Tracks issues with tests and testing infrastructure.

name: Thrift API
description: Tracks changes to the Hive Thrift APIs

name: Types
description: Issues related to Hive Query Languages type system

name: UDF
description: This includes the UDFs and UDAFs

name: Web UI
description: Tracks issues dealing with Web Interface.

name: Windows
description: Issues related to running Hive on Windows (not including Cygwin, MSYS, etc)
